page.title: 19THE OWNER OF GRYCE HALL
page.content: Lord Savile is the owner of Gryce Hall. It says in 'WHO'S WHO' 1978 that he owns 18,000 acres of land and he enjoys shooting and music. His full name is George Halifax Lumley Savile and he was born on the 24th of January 1919. Lord Savile has been J.P. of Dewsbury since 1955 and (Deputy Lieutenant of Yorkshire since 1954). He is a commander of the knights of St. John. When we spoke to him on the telephone he told us more about himself. He is not related to the Queen and he is a bachelor. He is a member of the House Of Lords which he says is hard work at times. While he is away two cooks and a house keeper look after Gryce Hall. His favourite composer is Mozart. We think Lord Savile is very lucky to live at Gryce Hall.
